category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_SM_Hours_Per_Month_Preference
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of work hours per month, as used for calculating calendar end dates. The value can vary depending on the site (e.g 20 days * 8 hours for the US, 20 days * 7.5 hours for the UK). The default value is 160.
